A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Can I give it a zero? What can I tell you that hasn't been said already? I watched it on the first Friday and have spent 2 weeks trying to cope with what I saw. The script makes no sense\, not even on Star Wars. This is worse than Phantom Menace and worse than Clone Wars. I understand what Disney is trying to do in a way but is still stupid. You guys could have finished the original story with episodes 7-9\, and make way to whatever new stories you wanted with Star Wars. But no\, what we got instead?
Poe decides to audition for Guardians of the Galaxy.
Finn and Rose spend 30 minutes on a mission that ends in nothing.
The same Luke that turned Darth Vader into Anakin tried to kill his nephew because might turn to the dark side.
Vice Admiral Holdo give us lessons about Tumblr.
Ban Swolo and Rey Force Skype throughout the movie.
Luke moves like Neo.
Chewbacca\, Porgs\, the millennium falcon\, and cristal foxes are on display to accentuate their 2.5 lengthy commercial.
No character progression what-so-ever\, just special effects and stunning visuals. This is the kind of movie that we could expect from Michael Bay. Its garbage\, skip it\, wait for it on DVD\, don't waste your money on it. 
"I'm Mary Poppins y'all." - Leia Organa
